text: Without Reservations is a 1946 American comedy movie directed by Mervyn LeRoy and was based on the novel Thanks, God! I'll Take It From Here by Jane Allen and Mae Livingston. It stars John Wayne, Claudette Colbert, Don DeFore, Anne Triola, Frank Puglia, Frank Wilcox and was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1946 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Mervyn LeRoy
title: Without Reservations
